data.title: CONTEST: Stand a chance to win a pair of tickets to FOLLIES!
data.meta_description: Singapore & Asian Film News Portal since 2006
data.text:
CONTEST: Stand a chance to win a pair of tickets to FOLLIES!1 min read

Reading Time: < 1 minute

Synopsis:

Stephen Sondheim’s legendary 1987 musical enjoyed a sold-out run at the National Theatre in 2017. Now, catch this glorious revival in all its colours and emotions as it screens at Esplanade this September.New York, 1971. There’s a party on the stage of the Weismann Theatre. Tomorrow the iconic building will be demolished. Thirty years after their final performance, the Follies girls gather to have a few drinks, sing a few songs and lie about themselves.

Tracie Bennett, Janie Dee and Imelda Staunton play the magnificent Follies in this dazzling new production, directed by Dominic Cooke (The Comedy of Errors). Winner of Academy, Tony, Grammy and Olivier awards, Sondheim’s previous work includes A Little Night Music, Sweeney Todd and Sunday in the Park with George.

Screening Details:

Date: 29 Sept 2018, Saturday

Time: 3:30PM

Venue: Esplanade Theatre

Film Details:

National Theatre Live (Screening)

2hr 30min

Rated PG13

Book by James Goldman

Music and lyrics by Stephen Sondheim

Directed by Dominic Cooke

Starring Tracie Bennett, Janie Dee and Imelda Staunton

This film is a recording of a theatre performance.

Instructions:

1. Share this post with your friends via any of the social media channels.

2. Tell us why you want to win! Email your answer, full name, and mobile number to events@sinema.sg by Thursday, 13 September 2018 with the title FOLLIES GIVEAWAY.

3. The winner will be notified by email. We seek your cooperation to participate only if are able to attend the screening on the date. Thank you.

Prizes courtesy of Esplanade.

Share this:
